name: fullstack-master-repo
description: Full-stack master repository with shared packages, backend, web, and mobile applications

scripts.build:backend: yarn build:shared && cd backend && yarn build
scripts.build:web: yarn build:shared && cd web && yarn build
scripts.build:all: yarn build:shared && yarn workspaces run build
scripts.dev: yarn build:shared && concurrently "yarn dev:shared" "yarn dev:backend" "yarn dev:web"
scripts.install:all: yarn install && yarn workspaces run install
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces run clean && rm -rf node_modules
